content: below aker the chain 1 of the next round it should look as in the 2nd photo below leave the color of the previous round behind for easy pick up in the next round the chain 1 at the beginning of each round does not count as a st unless indicated otherwise the 1st st of each round is made in the next st aker the st in which the chain 1 was made in the last st of each round is made in the same st as the starhng chain 1 was made in for placement of the last single_crochet of a round see the photo below all single_crochet are made in bl only of the next st of the previous round all double_crochet are made in fl only of the next st 2 rounds below © bokky square by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 3 the chart how to read the chart this chart shows 1 repeat x 4 renders a complete square color a white in the chart is the background color color b pink in the chart is the pa%ern color read the chart from the the right to the the lek and from the bobble%om the magic_ring to the top round 27 start each round at the round number on the right hand side read up to the green corner chain 1 square and then conhnue reading to the lek the red arrow in the chart at round 12 indicates the reading direchon each round starts with a chain 1 which is not shown in the chart half_double_crochet is used in round 1 only the 1st square above a round number on the right hand side indicates the 1st st of the round each repeat ends at the light yellow square on the lek the color of the square with the number of the round indicates the color to be used in that round each grey x-square these are indicated as double_crochet in the wri%en pa%ern both double_crochet 1 before and 1 aker a corner are to be made in the same fl of the chain 1 that is 2 rounds below © bokky square by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 4 for round 3 the double_crochet are made in the fl of the half_double_crochet 2 rounds below see 1st photo below for all other rounds the double_crochet are made in the fl of the chain 1 2 rounds below see 2nd photo below fold the corner back for easier access in that fl of the chain 1 see 3rd photo below a square with a slanted line to the upper right skip the next st double_crochet in the fl only of the next st 2 row down the next double_crochet of the round is made in the same fl a square with a slanted line to the upper lek double_crochet in the fl of the same st as the previous double_crochet was made in and skip the next st before making the next st
